investigatorQuestion.text: Tell me about your relationship with the victim.

maskAnswers.playerLine: We were business associates. Our interactions were strictly professional and documented.

lowTension.text: Your silence is a choice, but it’s a heavy one to carry.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: Every second you spend not talking is a second the world decides your guilt for you.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: You think staring makes you look innocent, but it only delays the inevitable.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicLowTension/The Stoic Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Say something, damn it! You think this quiet act makes you untouchable?
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: You think your mask protects you?
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tesion 2.mp3

highTension.text: I will tear that calm right off your face if I have to!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/StoicHighTension/The Stoic High Tesion 3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: They were... they were my friend. I still can't believe they're gone. We had our differences, but I cared about them.

lowTension.text: I believe you're scared, and for once, that fear is making you useful.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/Victim Good Low T1.mp3

lowTension.text: I see it in your eyes—you’re done lying. Good.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/Victim Good Low T2.mp3
Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimLowTension/Victim Good Low T3.mp3

highTension.text: Stop the crying and stay on that thought.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/Victim Good High T1.mp3

highTension.text: Keep talking! Every piece you give me is a weight off your shoulders.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/Victim Good High T2.mp3

highTension.text: Stop shaking and start talking! You're finally making sense!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/VictimHighTension/Victim Good High T3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: What are you implying? That I had something to do with this?!

lowTension.text: All that noise won’t change anything. You’re just wasting oxygen that you’re going to need later.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/The Hothead Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: A loud mouth. A closed mind. A locked cell.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/The Hothead Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: Anger is just a mask for fear. I'm looking forward to seeing what's hiding underneath.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadLowTension/The Hothead Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Keep screaming and I’ll make sure only four walls and a steel door will hear you from now on!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/The Hothead High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: Finally, real passion. Everything comes out when people lose control.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/The Hothead High Tension 2.mp3

highTension.text: You were so focused on yelling you forgot to keep the pieces together.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/HotheadHighTension/The Hothead High Tension 3.mp3

maskAnswers.playerLine: We got along wonderfully. Everyone loved them. I'm sure you'll find only positive things about our relationship.

lowTension.text: That’s an intricate story, but even the tightest knots eventually unravel!
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 1.mp3

lowTension.text: You weave beautiful webs. But even the spider eventually gets tangled.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 2.mp3

lowTension.text: You weave. You spin. You choke.
lowTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverLowTension/The Deceiver Low Tension 3.mp3

highTension.text: Stop spinning webs! The truth is staring at you and you’re still trying to paint over it!
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 1.mp3

highTension.text: Every word is rot. Every breath is poison. Every second is a lie.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 2.mp3

highTension.text: You think you're smart? You're in that chair for a reason, and it’s not because you’re a genius.
highTension.voiceClipPath: Assets/Resources/Audio Voice Lines/DeceiverHighTension/The Deceiver High Tension 3.mp3
